SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.client

Class PlayerData

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.client.ClientData
it.polimi.ingsw.model.client.PlayerData
public class PlayerData extends ClientData
The PlayerData class extends the ClientData class and contains the data specific to the player in the game. The client must have the valid placements, the hand, the global objectives, the starting objectives, the personal objective, and the starting card.

  • Field Summary

      public void addToHand(Card card) throws HandFullException
      Adds a card to the client's hand if the hand is not already full.
      Parameters:

      Throws:

    • removeFromHand

      public void removeFromHand(Card card) throws ElementNotInHand
      Removes a card from the client's hand if it exists.
      Parameters:
      card - The card to be removed from the hand.
      Throws:
      ElementNotInHand - If the specified card is not in the client's hand.
